ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.1.2_0: At that time a monk had been given robe-cloth outside the robe season.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.1.4_0: He then woven that monk’s robe again and again,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.1.5_0: Just then the Buddha was walking about the dwellings and he saw that monk again.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.1.6_0: He went up to him and said,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.1.8_0: “Venerable, this robe-cloth which I had been given.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.1.9_0: if there is not enough cloth when the robe is being made.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.1.10_0: That’s why I lift it up and smooth it out again and again.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.1.11_0: “Are you expecting to receive more cloth?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.1.13_0: After giving a teaching, the Buddha addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.1.14_0: “I allow you to store out-of-season robe-cloth and then store it out.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.2.1_0: When they knew that the Buddha had given this allowance, some monks kept out-of-season robe-cloth for more than a month,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.2.2_0: in bundles on a bamboo robe-rack.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.2.3_0: While walking about the dwellings, Venerable Ānanda saw that robe-cloth,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.1_0: “It’s our out-of-season robe-cloth, which we’re keeping because we’re expecting more.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.2_0: “How long have you kept this cloth?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.4_0: Venerable Ānanda complained and criticized them,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.5_0: “How can these monks keep out-of-season robe-cloth for more than a month?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.6_0: After rebuking those monks in many ways, Venerable Ānanda told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha gathered and questioned the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.7_0: “Is it true, monks, that some monks do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.10_0: “... How can these foolish men keep out-of-season robe-cloth for more than a month?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.11_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.12_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.13.1_0: ‘When his robe is finished and the robe-making season has ended, if out-of-season robe-cloth is given to a monk, he may receive it if he wishes.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.14_0: If he receives it, he should quickly make a robe.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.15_0: If there is not enough cloth, but he is expecting more, he should keep it at most one month to make up the lack.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:1.3.16_0: If he keeps it beyond that, even if he expects more cloth, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.2_0: the monk has made a robe, or the robe-cloth has been lost, destroyed, or burnt, or he has abandoned his expectation of receiving further robe-cloth.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.4_0: it has ended according to one of the eight summaries or the Sangha has ended it, whichever comes first.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.6_0: if the robe-making procedure has not been done, robe-cloth that is given during the eleven months.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.7_0: for one who has participated in the robe-making procedure, it is given during the seven months.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.8_0: The robe-cloth that was given is called “out-of-season robe-cloth”.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.10_0: Is given by the Sangha, by a group, by a relative, or by a friend, or there are rags, or it is by means of his own property.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.12_0: if he desires, he may receive it.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.13_0: If he receives it, he should quickly make a robe:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.14_0: it should be made within ten days.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.15_0: If there is not enough cloth:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.16_0: if there is not enough cloth when the robe is being made.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.17_0: He should keep it for one month at the maximum.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.18_0: he should keep it for one month at the maximum.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.20_0: for the purpose of making up the lack.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.1.22_0: he is expecting more from the Sangha, from a group, from a relative, or from a friend, or he is expecting to get it by means of his own property.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.1_0: If he keeps it beyond that, even if he expects more cloth:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.2_0: If he is given the expected robe-cloth, it must be made into a robe within ten days.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.3_0: ... twenty days after he was given the original robe-cloth, it must be made into a robe within ten days.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.4_0: If he is given the expected robe-cloth three days after ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.7_0: If he is given the bathing robe ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.9_0: If the river has been lost,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.11_0: If he is given the expected robe-cloth, it must be made into a robe within ten days.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.12_0: If the robe-cloth is given by one day ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.21_0: ... twenty days after he was given the original robe-cloth, it must be made into a robe within ten days.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.22_0: ... twenty days after he was given the original robe-cloth, it must be made into a robe within one day.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.23_0: If he is given the expected robe-cloth twenty-two days after he was given the original robe-cloth, it must be made into a robe within eight days. ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.30_0: If he is given the expected robe-cloth twenty-nine days after he was given the original robe-cloth, it must be made into a robe within one day.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.31_0: If he is given the expected robe-cloth thirty days after he was given the original robe-cloth, it must be determined, transferred to another, or given away on that very day.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.32_0: If he does not determine it, transfer it to another, or give it away, it becomes subject to relinquishment at dawn on the thirty-first day.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.33_0: The blanket should be relinquished to a sangha, a group, or an individual.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.34_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.36_0: ‘Venerables, this out-of-season robe-cloth which I have kept for more than a month is to be relinquished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.37_0: I relinquish them to the Sangha.’ ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.40_0: ‘I give this robe-cloth back to you.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.2.41_0: If he is given the expected robe-cloth, but it is different from the robe-cloth originally given to him, and there are days remaining, he does not have to make a robe if he does not want to.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.1_0: If it is more than a month, but he perceives it as more, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.2_0: If it is more than a month, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.3_0: If it is more than a month, but he perceives it as less, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.4_0: If it has not been determined, but he perceives that it has ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.5_0: If it has not been transferred, but he perceives that it has ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.6_0: If it has not been given away, but he perceives that it has ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.7_0: If it has not been lost, but he perceives that it has ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.8_0: If the robe is not destroyed, but he perceives that it is, then, except if the monks have agreed, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.9_0: If it has not been burnt, but he perceives that it has ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.10_0: If it has not been stolen, but he perceives that it has, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.11_0: If he uses robe-cloth that should be relinquished without first relinquishing it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.12_0: If it is less than a month, but he perceives it as more, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.13_0: If it is less than a month, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.3.14_0: If it is less than a month and he perceives it as less, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.4.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.4.2_0: if within the robe season the haste-cloth is determined, transferred to another, given away, lost, destroyed, burnt, stolen, or taken on trust;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.4.4_0: if he is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:2.4.5_0: The third rule, the third training rule on the robe-making season, is finished.
